overview.description: The JCL IBM job 'CLOSEFIL' executes the 'SDSF' program to close multiple CICS files with SYSOUT directed to '*'.

dd_statement.logic:
/F CICSA,'CEMT SET FIL(TRANSACT ) CLO'
 /F CICSA,'CEMT SET FIL(CCXREF ) CLO'
 /F CICSA,'CEMT SET FIL(ACCTDAT ) CLO'
 /F CICSA,'CEMT SET FIL(CXACAIX ) CLO'
 /F CICSA,'CEMT SET FIL(USRSEC ) CLO'
